application_name.purpose: Displayed in the header, footer and login screen.

organisation_name.purpose: Displayed under the application name on the login screen and in the footer.

github_url.purpose: URL of GitHub repository in the footer.

password_tries.purpose: Number of allowed user login attempts before the account is locked out.

kiosk_tries.purpose: Number of allowed kiosk login attempts before kiosk mode is disabled.

public_catalogue.purpose: Make the catalogue of items available without login.
